verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> The word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came again unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man הִנָּבֵא֙ <S%H5012><s%> prophesy וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <S%H559><s%> and say כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הֵילִ֖ילוּ <S%H3213><s%> Howl הָ֥הּ <S%H1929><s%> ye Woe worth לַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> the day

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for קָר֣וֹב <S%H7138><s%> [is] near י֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> For the day וְקָר֥וֹב <S%H7138><s%> [is] near י֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> even the day לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day עָנָ֔ן <S%H6051><s%> a cloudy עֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> it shall be the time גּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen יִֽהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

וּבָאָ֥ה <S%H935><s%> shall come חֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> And the sword בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> upon Egypt וְהָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become חַלְחָלָה֙ <S%H2479><s%> and great pain בְּכ֔וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> shall be in Ethiopia בִּנְפֹ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> shall fall חָלָ֖ל <S%H2491><s%> when the slain בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> in Egypt וְלָקְח֣וּ <S%H3947><s%> and they shall take away הֲמוֹנָ֔הּ <S%H1995><s%> her multitude וְנֶהֶרְס֖וּ <S%H2040><s%> shall be broken down יְסוֹדֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H3247><s%> and her foundations

כּ֣וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> Ethiopia וּפ֤וּט <S%H6316><s%> and Libya וְלוּד֙ <S%H3865><s%> and Lydia וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעֶ֣רֶב <S%H6154><s%> Arabia וְכ֔וּב <S%H3552><s%> people and Chub וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> and the men אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land הַבְּרִ֑ית <S%H1285><s%> that is in league אִתָּ֖ם <S%H854><s%> by בַּחֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> with them by the sword יִפֹּֽלוּ׃ <S%H5307><s%> shall fall פ

כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD וְנָֽפְלוּ֙ <S%H5307><s%> shall fall סֹמְכֵ֣י <S%H5564><s%> They also that uphold מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> Egypt וְיָרַ֖ד <S%H3381><s%> shall come down גְּא֣וֹן <S%H1347><s%> and the pride עֻזָּ֑הּ <S%H5797><s%> of her power מִמִּגְדֹּ֣ל <S%H4024><s%> from the tower סְוֵנֵ֗ה <S%H5482><s%> of Syene בַּחֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> in it by the sword יִפְּלוּ־ <S%H5307><s%> shall they fall בָ֔הּ נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וְנָשַׁ֕מּוּ <S%H8074><s%> And they shall be desolate בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst אֲרָצ֣וֹת <S%H776><s%> of the countries נְשַׁמּ֑וֹת <S%H8074><s%> [that are] desolate וְעָרָ֕יו <S%H5892><s%> and her cities בְּתוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> shall be in the midst עָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> of the cities נַחֲרָב֖וֹת <S%H2717><s%> [that are] wasted תִּֽהְיֶֽינָה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

וְיָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> And they shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD בְּתִתִּי־ <S%H5414><s%> when I have set אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> a fire בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> in Egypt וְנִשְׁבְּר֖וּ <S%H7665><s%> shall be destroyed כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עֹזְרֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5826><s%> and [when] all her helpers

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יֵצְא֨וּ <S%H3318><s%> go forth מַלְאָכִ֤ים <S%H4397><s%> shall messengers מִלְּפָנַי֙ <S%H6440><s%> from me בַּצִּ֔ים <S%H6716><s%> in ships לְהַחֲרִ֖יד <S%H2729><s%> afraid אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כּ֣וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> Ethiopians בֶּ֑טַח <S%H983><s%> to make the careless וְהָיְתָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become חַלְחָלָ֤ה <S%H2479><s%> and great pain בָהֶם֙ בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> shall come upon them as in the day מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for הִנֵּ֖ה <S%H2009><s%> behold בָּאָֽה׃ <S%H935><s%> for lo it cometh ס

כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD וְהִשְׁבַּתִּי֙ <S%H7673><s%> to cease אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֲמ֣וֹן <S%H1995><s%> I will also make the multitude מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> by the hand נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֥ר <S%H5019><s%> of Nebuchadrezzar מֶלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king בָּבֶֽל׃ <S%H894><s%> of Babylon

ה֠וּא <S%H1931><s%> He וְעַמּ֤וֹ <S%H5971><s%> He and his people אִתּוֹ֙ <S%H854><s%> for עָרִיצֵ֣י <S%H6184><s%> with him the terrible גוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> of the nations מֽוּבָאִ֖ים <S%H935><s%> shall be brought לְשַׁחֵ֣ת <S%H7843><s%> to destroy הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וְהֵרִ֤יקוּ <S%H7324><s%> and they shall draw חַרְבוֹתָם֙ <S%H2719><s%> their swords עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> against Egypt וּמָלְא֥וּ <S%H4390><s%> and fill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land חָלָֽל׃ <S%H2491><s%> with the slain

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> And I will make יְאֹרִים֙ <S%H2975><s%> the rivers חָֽרָבָ֔ה <S%H2724><s%> dry וּמָכַרְתִּ֥י <S%H4376><s%> and sell אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> into the hand רָעִ֑ים <S%H7451><s%> of the wicked וַהֲשִׁמֹּתִ֞י <S%H8074><s%> waste אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and I will make the land וּמְלֹאָהּ֙ <S%H4393><s%> and all that is therein בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand זָרִ֔ים <S%H2114><s%> of strangers אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> I the LORD דִּבַּֽרְתִּי׃ <S%H1696><s%> have spoken ס

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD וְהַאֲבַדְתִּ֨י <S%H6><s%> I will also destroy גִלּוּלִ֜ים <S%H1544><s%> the idols וְהִשְׁבַּתִּ֤י <S%H7673><s%> to cease אֱלִילִים֙ <S%H457><s%> and I will cause [their] images מִנֹּ֔ף <S%H5297><s%> out of Noph וְנָשִׂ֥יא <S%H5387><s%> and there shall be no more a prince מֵאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will no יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> and I will put יִרְאָ֖ה <S%H3374><s%> a fear בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וַהֲשִׁמֹּתִי֙ <S%H8074><s%> desolate אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פַּתְר֔וֹס <S%H6624><s%> And I will make Pathros וְנָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> and will set אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire בְּצֹ֑עַן <S%H6814><s%> in Zoan וְעָשִׂ֥יתִי <S%H6213><s%> and will execute שְׁפָטִ֖ים <S%H8201><s%> judgments בְּנֹֽא׃ <S%H4996><s%> in No

וְשָׁפַכְתִּ֣י <S%H8210><s%> And I will pour חֲמָתִ֔י <S%H2534><s%> my fury עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on סִ֖ין <S%H5512><s%> upon Sin מָע֣וֹז <S%H4581><s%> the strength מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְהִכְרַתִּ֖י <S%H3772><s%> and I will cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֲמ֥וֹן <S%H1995><s%> the multitude נֹֽא׃ <S%H4996><s%> of No

וְנָתַ֤תִּי <S%H5414><s%> And I will set אֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> fire בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> in Egypt ח֤וּל <S%H2342><s%> shall have great [תָּחִיל כ] (תָּחוּל֙ <S%H2342><s%> will writhe ק) סִ֔ין <S%H5512><s%> Sin וְנֹ֖א <S%H4996><s%> and No תִּהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְהִבָּקֵ֑עַ <S%H1234><s%> shall be rent asunder וְנֹ֖ף <S%H5297><s%> and Noph צָרֵ֥י <S%H6862><s%> [shall have] distresses יוֹמָֽם׃ <S%H3119><s%> daily

בַּח֥וּרֵי <S%H970><s%> The young men אָ֛וֶן <S%H206><s%> of Aven וּפִי־ בֶ֖סֶת <S%H6364><s%> and of Pibeseth בַּחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword יִפֹּ֑לוּ <S%H5307><s%> shall fall וְהֵ֖נָּה <S%H2007><s%> into בַּשְּׁבִ֥י <S%H7628><s%> into captivity תֵלַֽכְנָה׃ <S%H1980><s%> will go

וּבִֽתְחַפְנְחֵס֙ <S%H8471><s%> At Tehaphnehes חָשַׂ֣ךְ <S%H2821><s%> will be dark הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> also the day בְּשִׁבְרִי־ <S%H7665><s%> when I shall break שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹט֣וֹת <S%H4133><s%> there the yokes מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְנִשְׁבַּת־ <S%H7673><s%> shall cease בָּ֖הּ גְּא֣וֹן <S%H1347><s%> and the pomp עֻזָּ֑הּ <S%H5797><s%> of her strength הִ֚יא <S%H1931><s%> in her עָנָ֣ן <S%H6051><s%> as for her a cloud יְכַסֶּ֔נָּה <S%H3680><s%> shall cover וּבְנוֹתֶ֖יהָ <S%H1323><s%> her and her daughters בַּשְּׁבִ֥י <S%H7628><s%> into captivity תֵלַֽכְנָה׃ <S%H1980><s%> will go

וְעָשִׂ֥יתִי <S%H6213><s%> Thus will I execute שְׁפָטִ֖ים <S%H8201><s%> judgments בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> in Egypt וְיָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> and they shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD פ

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came בְּאַחַ֤ת <S%H259><s%> a עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <S%H6240><s%> ten שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> year בָּֽרִאשׁ֖וֹן <S%H7223><s%> in the first בְּשִׁבְעָ֣ה <S%H7651><s%> [month] in the seventh לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> [day] of the month הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> [that] the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זְר֛וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> the arm פַּרְעֹ֥ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt שָׁבָ֑רְתִּי <S%H7665><s%> I have broken וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> has not חֻ֠בְּשָׁה <S%H2280><s%> and lo it shall not be bound up לָתֵ֨ת <S%H5414><s%> for רְפֻא֜וֹת <S%H7499><s%> healing לָשׂ֥וּם <S%H7760><s%> to put חִתּ֛וּל <S%H2848><s%> a roller לְחָבְשָׁ֥הּ <S%H2280><s%> to bind לְחָזְקָ֖הּ <S%H2388><s%> it to make it strong לִתְפֹּ֥שׂ <S%H8610><s%> to hold בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> the sword ס

לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהֹוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הִנְנִי֙ <S%H2005><s%> behold אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> I am against פַּרְעֹ֣ה <S%H6547><s%> Behold I [am] against Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְשָֽׁבַרְתִּי֙ <S%H7665><s%> and will break אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זְרֹ֣עֹתָ֔יו <S%H2220><s%> his arms אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֲזָקָ֖ה <S%H2389><s%> the strong וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנִּשְׁבָּ֑רֶת <S%H7665><s%> and that which was broken וְהִפַּלְתִּ֥י <S%H5307><s%> to fall אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> and I will cause the sword מִיָּדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> out of his hand

וַהֲפִצוֹתִ֥י <S%H6327><s%> And I will scatter אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> the Egyptians בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> among the nations וְזֵרִיתִ֖ם <S%H2219><s%> and will disperse בָּאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <S%H776><s%> them through the countries

וְחִזַּקְתִּ֗י <S%H2388><s%> And I will strengthen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זְרֹעוֹת֙ <S%H2220><s%> the arms מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> and put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חַרְבִּ֖י <S%H2719><s%> my sword בְּיָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand וְשָׁבַרְתִּי֙ <S%H7665><s%> but I will break אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זְרֹע֣וֹת <S%H2220><s%> arms פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh's וְנָאַ֛ק <S%H5008><s%> and he shall groan נַאֲק֥וֹת <S%H5009><s%> him with the groanings חָלָ֖ל <S%H2491><s%> of a deadly wounded לְפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> before
